commit.message:
tree-ssa-dom.c (record_equivalences_from_phis): Remove an "if" whose condition is always true.

	* tree-ssa-dom.c (record_equivalences_from_phis): Remove an
	"if" whose condition is always true.

From-SVN: r91676
